Text: <c.white><c.mono_sans>I was just asking your son where</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>I came to tell you that Earl</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>Each one of you can take one</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>We don't like those in our house</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>Does it have one king who rules</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>Before you came, we had no need</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>and he has told me that there</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>yours to do with as you please.</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>I don't mind. I like the priest.</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>Who are you? What do you speak?</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>What is he saying? Who is he?</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>If you want to trade, then you</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>We will take you to meet him.</c.mono_sans></c.white>
